item.title: UPDATE monroecountywv Alert: Severe Thunderstorm Warning Sev
item.description: UPDATE monroecountywv Alert: Severe Thunderstorm Warning Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 3:20PM EDT until August 31 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg VA
